segments.text: Hey , young lady , get back here and have some breakfast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Dad ! I don't have time ! I'll be late for school !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You won't make it through the day without breakfast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Breakfast is brain food . Maybe that's why your grades are Suffering .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't ' Uh , Dad ' me . Sit down and have some lovely breakfast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright . You win . Please pass the brain food .
segments.speaker: S2
